entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 2:30 PM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11 except minus 6 south of Plum Point.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries south of Plum Point early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11 except minus 6 south of Plum Point. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15 except minus 9 south of Plum Point.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15 except minus 9 south of Plum Point. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
